titleStmt.title: A graine of musterd-seede or, the least measure of grace that is or can be effectuall to saluation. Corrected and amended by W. Perkins.
titleStmt.author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Legate, Printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge. 1611. And are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Crowne by Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
